item.title: Instrument Framework v1.14.4.22
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.14.4.22
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 20 Jan 2025 14:15:33 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.14.4]
- remove instrument types from package
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

Release Notes: Documentation and project organization
- split project into JSON-Schea and TEST-JSON-Schema
- remove test-json-schema.lvlib from json-schema.lvb
- add additional VI descriptions to API methods
- fix broken development VI

item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.5.5
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.5.5
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Sun, 19 Jan 2025 11:58:00 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: update package dependencies
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin
